backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO meta tags, fonts, favicon, and LocalBusiness JSON-LD.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component assembling all page sections with header, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing brand info, contact details, quick links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo, nav links, mobile menu, and call CTA, including scroll-based styling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with scroll-reveal animations, descriptive text, and a highlights grid showcasing experience and capabilities.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form that sends details via WhatsApp, displays contact info, and uses scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays a scroll-revealed FAQ section using an accordion with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Shows a gallery grid of images with lazy-loading, skeleton placeholders, and scroll-reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Implements the hero banner with background image, branding, CTAs (call, WhatsApp, quote), and scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service offerings in animated cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Renders a testimonials section with scroll-reveal animations and a grid of client reviews using cards and star icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays a grid of reasons to choose the service with icons and scroll-reveal animation inside a styled section.
frontend/src/components/StickyWhatsAppBu: Floating WhatsApp CTA button with pulse animation and tooltip.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to toggle visibility for scroll-based reveal animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom black‑and‑gold theme variables, typography, utilities, and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling extra plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining goals, features, requirements, images, and architectural notes for the website build.
